systems, namely, ATILF-LLF (Al Saied et al., 2017) and SHOMA (Taslimipoor and Rohanian, 2018). GCN works

for discontinuous MWEs in EN and FA, while H-combined outperforms based on results for all MWEs except for FA. The overall results confirm our assumption that a hybrid architecture can mitigate errors of individual models and bolster their strengths.
